main event: A pilot reported seeing a flying object at about 15,000 feet. The object was described as silver in color and was surrounded by a bright light. It moved straight across the sky before disappearing.
interesting points: The object moved at a high speed and disappeared suddenly.
The sighting was witnessed by multiple people in the area.
The object is considered an unidentified flying object.
A duck hunter almost shot at a disc-shaped object that descended to about 500 feet and then rapidly disappeared.
Another duck hunter reported seeing a large, disc-shaped object that hovered over him and his grandson, changed colors, and then rose vertically and disappeared.
sighted object: silver, disc-shaped object surrounded by bright light
location: Portland, Connecticut; Atlantic City, New Jersey
witnesses: pilot, multiple people in the area, duck hunters
